SqlOutput.Sql: (((COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0) * COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))/POWER(CAST((CONVERT(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0),CHAR)) AS DOUBLE), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))) * POWER(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)))
SqlOutput.Guard: TRUNC(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0))<>COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0) OR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)<>0 AND LOG(10,ABS(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)))*COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c, 0)>38) OR NOT REGEXP_REPLACE((CONVERT(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0),CHAR)),'[0-9]+','0') REGEXP '^[+-]?(0|0\.|\.0|0\.0)([Ee][+-]?0)?$' OR TRUNC(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))<>COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0) OR(CAST((CONVERT(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0),CHAR)) AS DOUBLE)<>0 AND LOG(10,ABS(CAST((CONVERT(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0),CHAR)) AS DOUBLE)))*COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>38) OR POWER(CAST((CONVERT(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0),CHAR)) AS DOUBLE), COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0))=0

TRUNC($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c)<>$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c OR($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c<>0 AND LOG(10,ABS($!s0s!$.customnumber3__c))*$!s0s!$.customnumber3__c>38) OR NOT REGEXP_REPLACE((CONVERT($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c,CHAR)),'[0-9]+','0') REGEXP '^[+-]?(0|0\.|\.0|0\.0)([Ee][+-]?0)?$' OR TRUNC($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c)<>$!s0s!$.customnumber2__c OR(CAST((CONVERT($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c,CHAR)) AS DOUBLE)<>0 AND LOG(10,ABS(CAST((CONVERT($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c,CHAR)) AS DOUBLE)))*$!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>38) OR POWER(CAST((CONVERT($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c,CHAR)) AS DOUBLE), $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c)=0
